NF.Q: In the column Product Categories of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 17396? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Books to node Europe and from node Electronics to node North America, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Books} to node {Europe} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Books to node Middle East, from node Electronics to node Asia, and from node Electronics to node Oceania, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Electronics} to node {Asia} is the largest.
